website_summaries.verdict: Tasty, effective elderberry gummies for seasonal immune support.
pros: The gummies, while on the tart side, are still kid and adult friendly
Many buyers report that the gummies stopped them from catching the cold and flu, along with alleviating symptoms
cons: A few users report stomach upset after ingestion

customer_reviews.title: Do not be fooled
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have been taking these for a while now and the company recently changed the formula and the label, the old label shows them not having preservatives in their gummies, as well as them now using vegetable oil instead of coconut oil, and they also smell horrible now! Definitely lost my business, I will no longer buy from them and I’ll definitely be spreading the word! We do not deserve to be tricked.
customer_reviews.author: Nia Bernard

customer_reviews.title: New Ingredients—-buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great product, but they recently changed the ingredients. I’ve uploaded pictures for reference, but they have switched from coconut oil to a palm and coconut blend. The packaging says “new look- same great product” but that’s misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: THIS USED TO BE SOOOOOO GOOD :(
customer_reviews.text: THIS USED TO BE REALLY GOOD. THEY CHANGED THE FORMULA. WHY DO THAT??? WOULD BE BETTER TO KEEP THE ORIGINAL FORMULA AND CHARGE US A LITTLE MORE MONEY TO HAVE THE BETTER PRODUCT. I will have to find an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: AMAZON FAN

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be working great; the school year will be the real test though.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has special needs and is in a unit at school. She was sick no less than 8 times last school year which in turn got my wife and I sick and our son. I had her start taking these at breakfast about 3 months ago (right as school ended) and she hasn't been sick all summer. School starts back up this Monday, so hopefully that trend continues through the school year. So either these gummies work great or I have to have a serious conversation with the school about their sanitation policies.
customer_reviews.author: J Krans

customer_reviews.title: On our 3rd bottle!
customer_reviews.text: My family has two of these every morning and I know they are doing wonders for our immune systems. My kids like them TOO much, though. They taste wonderful, but be sure to keep them stored away from kiddos for that reason. I’d like to make my own elderberry gummies someday, but these will definitely suffice for the meantime. Aside from sugar, the ingredient list is not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: I waited forever for this product to arrive and when ...
customer_reviews.text: I waited forever for this product to arrive and when it did it was just an empty enevelope. The empty enevelope actually scared us! Hopeful I get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kielty

customer_reviews.title: Toxic?
customer_reviews.text: Caused stomach pain and diarrhea. Either they used unripe berries or it contains some other toxins.
customer_reviews.author: George Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Changed and NOT for the better!
customer_reviews.text: I thought we had found the perfect brand. But the most recent bottle will be the last, now that the ingredients have been changed, including the addition of palm oil. Everything is different... taste, texture and smell. What a shame to ruin a great product!
customer_reviews.author: sings4joy

customer_reviews.title: They taste good too.
customer_reviews.text: I have the flu, and started taking these and have noticed a difference already. They taste good too.
customer_reviews.author: The cleaner

customer_reviews.title: Helped me recover from a cold
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness, these gummies taste way too good. I bought these because a couple blogs I read regularly such as Wellness Mama recommended them for cold/flu treatment. I came down with a cold and two days after taking these gummies I was pretty much recovered. I don't know how much of my recovery can be attributed to them per se, but I will definitely take them again next time I'm sick. My husband who is pretty picky even enjoyed the taste. It takes a little willpower to restrict your serving size to two a day as directed ha.
customer_reviews.author: Avalon

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what is going on...but received an empty package after weeks of waiting.
customer_reviews.author: Manisha Darden

customer_reviews.title: I have avoided flu with these!
customer_reviews.text: Great Taste and I have managed to not get sick while taking these vitamins. After getting my first case of pneumonia and more song over 2 weeks of Work, my friend suggested I start taking Elderberry. I have 3 kids in daycare so we are sick A LOT! My immune system also fails me every flu season but since taking these gummy vitamins (2 a day) since November, I have Managed to avoid the flu while caring for my 1 year old who had the flu! If you are tired of getting sick, get these!!!
customer_reviews.author: TheNonPerfectMom

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product came with the seal open and 2 extra gummies in the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Dibblee

customer_reviews.title: These are super yummy. All my kids will eat them
customer_reviews.text: These are super yummy. All my kids will eat them. They feel kind of hard in your hand, but they are gummies indeed when you eat them. They are a little on the tart side which I like:). I feel like these help us not get sick hardly EVER comparatively....
customer_reviews.author: JILL

customer_reviews.title: Beware if you have Bee Allergies
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased for my mother. But she couldnt take for about 4 days each day she had an itching sensationall over that did pass but last anout 5 to 7 min. Please note shows Bees wax. Not sure if this may contain allergic reaction to others with bee allergies but note may cause itching for this who might. I had to replace these for another kind if elderberry. My kids and i are are able to take this. I have pollen allergies but not allergic to bees so im not sure which would cause this issue.
customer_reviews.author: silly

customer_reviews.title: They also love the taste
customer_reviews.text: I swear by these. My kids were non stop sick last year of school... now they take two a day and had one short lived cold so far. They also love the taste. I also tried the lozenges and like the gummies way better.
customer_reviews.author: AARON

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Vitamin Gummies!
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered elderberry has many benefits especially keeping me from getting the flu/cold this year. This vitamin gummy is very tasty and looks like eating grape candies. Too bad, I can't eat the whole bottle. I would eat the whole bottle throughout the whole day if it is not bad for me, that's how tasty it is. No, I didn't eat the whole bottle in a day. I highly recommend this elderberry gummy vitamin. But please refrain from eating it like a candy and try not to finish it in 1 day.
customer_reviews.author: Bargain_Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Yummy
customer_reviews.text: These are very sweet and like a fruit snack in consistency. Everyone in the fam likes them. One member of the family was taking these and managed to dodge the plague the rest of the fam had--was it the gummies? I guess we'll never know...but I'm gonna sneak a few during cold season ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Peach Ring

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what's in these, but my husband and I both had bad stomach problems after eating them. I had an upset stomach for hours and he had diarrhea. Tossed them out. He actually liked the way they tasted, I did not. Would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: malfoyfan

customer_reviews.title: An ounce of prevention. . .
customer_reviews.text: I work in an office building with over 500 workers. And for several years I would develop bronchitis that would last for 6-8 weeks and I would catch it 3-4 times per year! Once it developed into pneumonia! So I decided to focus on building my immune system. I began taking Abundandt Life Wellness’s Echinacea Elderberry Goldenseal Well was Booster, Nature’s Way Sambucus Elderberry Gummies, both twice everyday. Since then I’ve had no respiratory issues of any kind for the last year.
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Container Opened, Vitamins Missing/Eaten Upon Receiving
customer_reviews.text: This review is based less on the product and solely on the fact that when I received my order, one of the containers had been opened and half eaten. I ordered two bottles and put them side by side and noticed one was half empty. Upon that discovery, I noticed that the quality/safety seal had been broken as well. This is horrible quality control whether it was on behalf of amazon or the manufacturer. All I know is that in a time when we’re all extra paranoid about how many and who is touching our products before we get them, this is definitely upsetting.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great to strengthen the immune system!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak to the clinical research, but I’m an R.N. working on the front line during the Covid pandemic. I take 2 of these gummies every day with some liquid echinacea in the morning and I’m staying healthy. I’ve been taking them since regular flu season started before the pandemic and I notice a huge difference in my immune system!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Leach

customer_reviews.title: My kids love them
customer_reviews.text: My kids love eating these! I used to have a hard time getting my kids to drink the elderberry syrup but they have no problem taking one of these a day.
customer_reviews.author: Ken C.

customer_reviews.title: Best immunity booster
customer_reviews.text: Last winter my preschooler and toddler were sick literally every other week. Their pediatrician recommended elderberry. This year the preschooler got a cold in September and I ordered these. My kids and I have been taking them almost daily for the past 4 months. The preschooler has gotten one stomach bug that lasted half a day. That’s it. The toddler has been healthy all winter! My husband has even gotten strep and the flu, but my kids and I were fine. I was skeptical, but these really work!
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Possible Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 6yr old, because going to public school she was constantly staying sick. After several days of use and no other changes in household or ingesting anything differently my daughter broke out in hives. Her entire body was covered. She has been on Benadryl and steroids for two days now and hives are still appearing. We stopped taking these, but I’m not sure if this is 100% what caused her reaction but literally nothing else has changed or been entered into her life.
customer_reviews.author: Tia H.

customer_reviews.title: ~ Elderberry ~ Zinc ~ Vitamin C ~ Thank You for Keeping Us Well!! ~
customer_reviews.text: These ARE my all-time favorite Sambucus Elderberry Gummies, Herbal Supplements with Vitamin C and Zinc. These have a child-proof lid, are delicious, AND have everything that we are needing in them. I have them on subscribe and save, as well as the kids' variety for the grand kids. These have definitely been helping us stay well and I am thankful for them. I like that they have a tamper-proof lid in place. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Small~Town~Girl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!  Cheaper than the Sambuccol brand and work great
customer_reviews.text: I had been buying the Sambuccol brand at Walmart until I found these on Amazon. They work just as well and are cheaper. These elderberry gummies (and the quick dissolve Sambuccol tablets) have been amazing. Every time I feel a cold coming...sore throat, sinus issues, congestion - I hurry up and start taking these. Virtually every time, it stops the cold from ever developing, or the symptoms are very minor and are gone in a day or two. This has happened over and over again over the past 5-6 years, so there is no way that it's coincidence. The Black Edlerberry stuff actually works. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is the one you want.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. Taking 2 gummies during the Coronavirus mess to keep my zinc up. Just reordered. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Power

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of review about this gummy and ordered it but I didn’t see any positive things from my side . From last month i am using this product but my son got 2-3 times cold , cough and fever and viral infection also . I will not recommend this product and i will give 0 star .
customer_reviews.author: TheNextOne

customer_reviews.title: Not the same anymore
customer_reviews.text: So upset!!!! I've ordered these for a long time now. And they are very poor quality!!! They are not darker like the others. They are smaller and a different texture. It's almost like the halved what they are suppose to be!
customer_reviews.author: KimRay

customer_reviews.title: Winter Essential
customer_reviews.text: This are a winter staple/essential for my family. I have made my own elderberry syrup in the past which, while more economical, is less well received by my kids and we are less likely to take it. I set these out in the morning for my kids with their one other vitamin and they grab it after breakfast. They'd eat the whole bottle if they could because they are absolutely delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: don't swallow a gummy
customer_reviews.text: we started taking Elderberry supplements last year before COVID. taking the Elderberry syrup helped get over the cold I had. my husband swears because of these he has not had a head cold for 2 seasons. with COVID on the rampage we have upped our intake of the gummies by taking them everyday but also whenever we come in from running errands take a couple of gummies to boost our immune system from whatever we may have come in contact with while running errands.
customer_reviews.author: CLPS

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great. But so does Starburst. (They do the same healing)
customer_reviews.text: Everyone has been telling me, before you get sick go get this Elderberry stuff. I’m 34 how is this the first time I’ve heard of it? Anyways I get sick just as they arrive. Cool. Let me see how well these things work. 2 a day. They taste great btw. Like candy but literally has not made me feel any better. All that vitamin C, now Elderberry myths are for the birds. Hydration and rest are the only true things that work for a cold. Save your money and get some Mucinex and Sudafed and drink water.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Allergic Reaction?
customer_reviews.text: I broke out in itchy hives all over my legs after taking these about a week. I believe that they are what caused the reaction because it was the only new thing in my diet. It took awhile for the hives to go down with an antihistamine.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Take a chance
customer_reviews.text: Don't want to give any stars as this product doesn't deserve it. No seal on the outside, no seal inside and seems as though 1/4 are already gone. Reminded me of the tylenol scare. Absolutely won't consume anything without a seal. Just choose the trash can where these are finally headed. Took too much time to report, however, am tired of giving free marketing to companies. Something I used to get paid for. DON'T BUY!
customer_reviews.author: wendie deel

customer_reviews.title: This product has kept us well all holiday season!
customer_reviews.text: We literally buy two bottles a month during cold/flu season! Love these gummies! Last year was the first year we tried them and although we had some sniffles here and there, no one got the flu. I have a teenager and an elementary-aged child, so germs are everywhere in our house. My husband and I also take them daily and they have helped shorten any virus symptoms that come our way. You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, but will probably work for others
customer_reviews.text: Don't take this if you have autoimmune disease or allergies, as elderberry increases immune system activity. I took this to avoid getting sick, but it made my allergies flare up. The first night I took it, I was up all night with a runny nose and congestion, and had an increase in asthma symptoms. I felt like I had the worst cold the entire week I took these, until I made the connection and stopped. That being said, the gummies taste excellent, and if you are in perfect health, they will probably help you avoid getting sick.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement
customer_reviews.text: Zinc and Elderberry. While it is NOT a cure, it acts to help boost our immune system. While I have the option to work from home, my wife is a 1st responder. She has to go to our hospital 5 days a week. In addition to wearing masks, washing out hands thoroughly and social distance, we all take our 2 gummies a day to help our immune system defend against COVID among many other bugs. This is also very tasty, so much so that my 6 yo asks for it daily. I can only wish he has the same attitude for veggies!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Tian

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Last winter I had a terrible cough that wouldn’t go away. My daughter in law gave me some homemade elderberry syrup for Christmas. When taking it my cough was improving but the syrup was gone before my cough. A friend recommended Sambucus Elderberry gummies. Within days my cough was gone. This Spring a cough threatened to come again. I started taking the gummies and the cough was gone in a week. I’m sold. I keep a jar on the ready if I can get it in stock.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Immune system boosting!
customer_reviews.text: We started giving these to my daughter because she has some immune system issues and especially gets sick a lot during the winter. We wanted to try to give her a little boost before she started kindergarten since we knew she would be hit hard with a lot of different sicknesses starting school and all and they really seemed to help! Often when she just catches a cold she ends up hospitalized but since starting these gummy’s a little over six months ago she has not been hospitalized once this School year/winter. We are going to keep her on them for now since we feel that they are helping.
customer_reviews.author: sola

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works
customer_reviews.text: Great taste, seems to be effective. We take these as a preventative every day, and at the first sign of cold or flu, we take them several times a day. It significantly shortened my daughters bout with flu A. 4 days after initial onset, she was up and playing. She took two of these every 4 hours. We had an elderberry syrup that she found too sweet & tart, and finally flatout refused to take it. She loves these. Not bad price point. Get an extra bottle or two for flu season. Very pleased, every aspect.
customer_reviews.author: briekitten.

customer_reviews.title: TASTES GREAT & WORKS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter who is a nurse told me about these, I'm a believer! I do not get flu shots due to a VERY bad reaction several years ago, soooo when flu season is upon us (especially this year) I do whatever I can to keep the flu bugs away. No flu for me, whooohoo! I swear by Sambucus Gummies and 3000 mg of chew-able Vitamin C a day. I will continue to buy these for a very long time. :) THESE TASTE YUMMY TOO!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry products seem to help.
customer_reviews.text: Taking elderberry gummies to boost immune system in hopes of preventing colds/sinus/ sore throat. Good flavor and not too sweet. I used the Elderberry cough drops last February when I caught the flu --they are the best cough drops I've ever used. They actually helped me keep from coughing. If I had known about Elderberry gummies at that time - maybe I could have prevented being so sick with the flu. I get the flu even though I take the flu shot every year in November. I'm going to use the gummies everyday this year to see if they help.
customer_reviews.author: we

customer_reviews.title: My daughter & my husband caught a bad strain of the flu
customer_reviews.text: My daughter & my husband caught a bad strain of the flu. I gave my daughter this and not my husband to see the quality and if it works well. Her flu symptoms cleared up in less than 48 hrs. My husband I had him on DoTerra fit antibiotics & he was still complaining about feeling horrible days later. I’ll say this stuff is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Ka’uhane

customer_reviews.title: If the kids ask for them - you know they are good.
customer_reviews.text: Elderberry is a must have during the school year for our kiddos. We started taking elderberry last year and my son did not miss any school due to illness. The flavor of these are great. We've tried this brand's syrup and other brand's gummies and we keep coming back to these. We finally made the commitment to subscribe and save because we think we've found the best price, flavor, and taste. The one "con" is that when traveling, they will harden a bit (as expected) in our travel case. But not enough of a con to reduce a star.
customer_reviews.author: Guard of XandAja

customer_reviews.title: Great Immune Fighters
customer_reviews.text: These gummies have worked well for my grandsons. They were sick and passing germs back and forth early this flu/cold/virus season. Once we got started on Sambucus Elderberry Gummies they haven't been sick at all. Their father got the flu and neither of them got it. They had a flu shot too, but the gummies have kept them healthy too. Will make sure I have a supply all the time now.
customer_reviews.author: powell

customer_reviews.title: No more colds!
customer_reviews.text: Been taking them everyday for 7 months now. Haven’t gotten a cold yet (which is rare for me). When I start to feel a tiny cold coming on, I double up on these and take an emergen-c and I wake up feeling SO GOOD. As someone with a compromised immune system, I cannot stress how much these have helped. Plus it makes me excited to wake up because they taste so good and it’s the first thing I eat everyday!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I didn't have a cold this winter for the first winter in my life
customer_reviews.text: Everyone around me was sick with bad colds all winter. I chewed these good tasting gummies and stayed well for the first winter of my life. I'm now going through pollen season and they are keeping me from succombing to pollen sickness like everybody is suffering from now. Take these at the first sign of a cold or flu like illness. You may ward off a bad cold or flu. Stay with it for a few extra days to a week, after all symptoms have passed. I have a weakened immune system due to cancer and I believe this kept me well this winter.
customer_reviews.author: BottleTree Farm

customer_reviews.title: Great for keeping colds at bay.
customer_reviews.text: Super delicious where It is hard to believe that these are good for you. I went next door for Christmas at my neighbors to have Christmas dinner. The whole family was sniffling and sneezing coming down with a bad cold. I kept popping these gummies to boost my immune system.and they worked. I made them dinner and came home and rested. The bug kept trying to infiltrate my system and these gummies kept the cold bug away.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: They help shorten colds
customer_reviews.text: I was sick for about half of this year from the flu to multiple colds. I was reading a lot of reviews of teachers using this and it helping so I thought to give it a go. I haven't had a cold since. When I feel like I'm starting to get sick I start taking these and feel better by the end of the day or the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley J.

customer_reviews.title: If you have upset stomach easily, I suggest you get a different and pure ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually ordered the wrong product by mistake, and this one upsets my stomach a little. If you have upset stomach easily, I suggest you get a different and pure supplement form, but other than gummies.
customer_reviews.author: Jone

customer_reviews.title: Not the same!
customer_reviews.text: These are not like the ones I have purchased from local all natural store they are made with and contain VEGETABLE OIL NOT COCANUT OIL. Will not be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Perry

customer_reviews.title: Purchase again and again.
customer_reviews.text: This is our family’s go to, to keep us from getting sick. My kiddo has food/texture issues and getting him to take/eat anything is almost impossible. These however, he will take daily and they help keep him healthy! We have noticed all of us feeling better and keeping sickness away throughout the year. We have re ordered these over and again. After researching and trying other brands this is the best taste, value, and effectiveness. I recommend these to all of our friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: LMS

customer_reviews.title: Broken seal upon receiving
customer_reviews.text: I have had these before and thought I’d get them with an order I placed on amazon. When I revised and opened the item it was obvious the seal was broken. It doesn’t not appear to be tampered with it just looks like the “glue” in the seal was not pressed on to the container. Pictures attached. The vitamins themselves were very hard which are normally not. Even though I do not suspect tampering I am exchanging for a new bottle. Better safe than sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Cody and Mariah

customer_reviews.title: We love these, I cut them in half for my ...
customer_reviews.text: We love these, I cut them in half for my kids. We were using the liquid drops but this is less messy :)
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Howland

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how to say this but it was not fully full. Like other gummy vitamins it wasnt full in the box. I bought two of these for my kids and they love eating it but only problem is that it was like 70 percent filled with gummy. Except that it is our favorite gummy vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry to the rescue!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was sick week of 5/20/19 which was the week my son graduated high school. I had family fly in from everywhere. Had nausea and bad headache. Fast forward went to urgent care was told I had flu and sinus infection. I felt horrible. I made it through graduation day and that was my main goal. Friends told me about elderberry 2 days ago so I ordered it because I want to strengthen my immune system and guard myself for future viruses. Also was constipated (TMI sorry) this stuff worked for that within day of starting it.
customer_reviews.author: catherine howard

customer_reviews.title: Taste good and I will continue buying this.
customer_reviews.text: I have heard the benefit of Elderberry for a long time, especially on the immunity. I ordered this as our daily immune booster during this COVID-19 pandemic to help us have a good immune system. The gummies are in deep purple color and they taste pretty good! There is no extra sugar covered on the gummies and the sweetness of the gummies is at the right amount. Both me and my husband enjoy eating these gummies everyday. The price that Amazon listed for these gummies is very reasonable and Nature's Way is the brand that I trust for many years. This will be our regular daily supplement from now on and I will continue buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra

customer_reviews.title: June 2020
customer_reviews.text: I've bought these gummies for almost a year and have loved them! Due to COVID I haven't been able to buy them as they have been out of stock. Once I was able to buy them again, the gummies were a completely different texture and the bottle looked slightly different from the usual bottle. Ended up returning my amazon order and bought some at Target (where the bottle was the same as usual and the gummies were normal texture).
customer_reviews.author: MJC

customer_reviews.title: Super immunity boost
customer_reviews.text: Starting buying this supplement after the covid-19 started hitting hard. Wanted to protect myself and my husband. Best way to make sure our immunity is strong. The best supplement we have tried so far. The taste is also very yummy. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Flower@509

customer_reviews.title: I can't say if they work, but they are tasty!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if they work or not. I have had only one cold since I started taking them, but I was also walking around a theme park in improper layering for 4 days in the cold and wind. I can feed these to my littles and they eat them without questioning the "weird gummy taste" (i.e. vitamins/supplements in gummies usually have an odd taste) so I will say only minus 1 star for lack of proof of efficacy? Cost is super high, but I wanted to use up a gift card so I got these.
customer_reviews.author: KatieDidnt

customer_reviews.title: They taste great, and I can feel the difference especially with my allergies!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from allergies as does my husband. Almost as soon as I started taking these the allergies subsided. In fact I can even be outside during a windy day, and my allergies are not flaring up. That's a huge difference for me. My hubby doesn't take them everyday, but he took some a few nights ago, and remarked how much better his allergies were the next day. So I'm a big fan for that reason - if it helps with my immune system that'll be great, but thats one of those things that can be hard to measure. Still if I'm not constantly wiping my nose as I used to be, then I may not get sick so often.
customer_reviews.author: Mterpin

customer_reviews.title: Best treatment for cold and flu. Might save lives..
customer_reviews.text: This stuff saves my family from a lot of illness every year. These gummies make a cold last a total of 3 days, but I consume an entire bottle in 3 days. Everytime my daughter get a cold or the flu tgis stuff knocks it out very quickly. Forget about risky flu shots. Keep elderberry on supply and I bet it will insure your survival and greatly shorten the length of time you are sick. I take much more then what is recommended and have no issues at all.
customer_reviews.author: echotwin

customer_reviews.title: Nice flavor
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. I was afraid that they would have a medicinal flavor, but they could literally be candy. I wish that there were more dummies to the pack especially with a two gummy dosage making it quick to deplete. I will say that I don't notice a difference in my overall health. If anything this just gives the impression of being healthy. I don't know if I would consume these on a regular basis. Maybe during winter months when people are more susceptible to illnesses. But even then, vitamin C should also work.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how well these work!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought these before a family trip that we were taking in the middle of January. I wanted to make sure everyone was healthy before the trip. Myself, my husband and our 3 yr. old have been taking these for the last 4 months and NOBODY has gotten sick! That's saying a lot considering my 3 yr. old goes to daycare (where germs spread like crazy) The dose recommendation suggest that children 4 and older take 2 gummies daily. So we just give my 3 yr. old 1 gummy daily. I will forever swear by these.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: They work. I've been hesitant about posting a review ...
customer_reviews.text: They work. I've been hesitant about posting a review but I'm getting ready to place my third order so I have to admit they must be working. I've been taking these for several months now. Usually I'm plagued with sinus infections through the fall and winter but I haven't had any so far. They are definitely worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: North Carolina

customer_reviews.title: Good taste and noticeable results
customer_reviews.text: We live in a desert city, so dust and air quality are always a challenge for us. But when we started taking a gummy each day, we noticed that we struggled a lot less, which helps with our sleep and energy. We were even able to lessen and eliminate many over the counter medicines for allergies and nasal issues within the month! I recommend it for people who live in places that affect lung health and air quality.
customer_reviews.author: Shandee Niswander

customer_reviews.title: Tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: These taste really good. We tried homemade Elderberry syrup and it was awful. These are grapey. Kids love them. As to the efficacy, I got them 5 days into the flu so I don't know about how they worked on me but no one else in my house caught my flu. I am disappointed to see the price on these SKYROCKET after I bought them. It's shameful for sellers to basically price gouge while people are sick (and dying) from the flu!
customer_reviews.author: Disneyfannn

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware!!! Along with other reviews my bottle came opened and only a quarter of them left!! Who does that???
customer_reviews.author: Allyssa Turley

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to winter time regiment!!!
customer_reviews.text: I use elderberry every time school comes around and use it all winter and early spring until school is out for the summer. I give my kids this along with vitamin c and vitamin d3 as well as fish oil and multivitamins. Adding the elderberry I think has definitely helped cut down on any doctor visits. We are going on 2 winters now with no sickness, not sure if it is a combination of things but I will definitely keep this up! Happy mom healthy kids! I use to use the syrup but the gummies have just been convenient when your on the go!
customer_reviews.author: ariel

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so great!! I love this stuff! I have my whole family on them and have noticed way less sickness. They also taste amazing, which is a plus when giving to kids. I was getting a cold when I first started taking them and it took all of about 2 -3 days to be completely over, whereas I normally take about 2-3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look at it when it comes...don’t wait.
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been ordering this product off Amazon for quite sometime now. We have several children and order several bottles at once. I just opened the second bottle from my last order and the protective seal is broken. We are now stuck with it since it’s past the return window. Shame on us for not looking at it when we got it. We simply just put it in the cabinet until needed. Never have we ever had an issue until now.
customer_reviews.author: dmc07734

customer_reviews.title: Easy-To-Use & Tastes Good Too!
customer_reviews.text: Really like the flavor and ease-of-use of this product. Have been using these for years for myself and my whole family; it’s a brand we know & trust for the quality. I have an elementary school child and a high schooler-both love these! Can easily modify use for daily prevention and when we are sick. Price on Amazon is pretty good; we more like the fact that they restock often and it’s easy to get during cold & flu season.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra W

customer_reviews.title: Picky eater approved
customer_reviews.text: My kids are SO picky about the taste of vitamins. I tried to get them to drink elderberry syrup and they gagged. So I am super happy to report that they eat two of these at a time with no complaints. I will update later but so far no sickness or flu in any of my 4 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Letsgo4five

customer_reviews.title: Love this elderberry product and have turned my whole family ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this elderberry product and have turned my whole family onto them. Taste good and seem to be very effective. As my grandson said this winter, "I've been taking them twice a day and haven't gotten sick".
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: These Helped!
customer_reviews.text: These taste great! I take em once a day daily and twice a day when I start to feel symptomatic. Got sick for the first time since taking these and happy to say that I believe it helped shorten the duration and intensity of my cold/flu symptoms. When I get sick, the symptoms usually last for about 2.5 weeks. Five days after my first signs of a cold and I feel like I am 90% recovered. Also with a cold/flu I typically develop some nasal congestion and a cough. Although I have a slight cough, I had no nasal congestion. Time will tell if this is truly is helping so I will continue to take them to find out.
customer_reviews.author: EABC

customer_reviews.title: Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: I work at a hospital, so I make myself and my close coworkers take supplements to keep us healthy. Eating gummies instead of swallowing pills makes this much easier and palatable. These gummies taste great and although I’m not 100% sure regarding the claims of this herbal concoction, I’d rather stay safe than sorry. The flavor and reliability of the brand also has our favor.
customer_reviews.author: LoobyLibby

customer_reviews.title: Great but SO PRICEY!
customer_reviews.text: These are good and the kids didn't complain too much about the taste, but the price...at two gummies a day for four people in our household, we're through this bottle in a matter of days. I just can't afford to keep up with it even though I believe that elderberry is good for the immune system. I think we may try to grow our own and make our own gummies next year. It has to be cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Erin K.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my 4 year old when she came home from preschool with signs of an early head cold. Recieved not even 48 hours after ordering and the day after she took her 1st gummies, her symptoms were gone. Will definitely keep buying these every month while germ season is active! I recommend it to my cousin, we'll see if it keep her little one from getting sick less often from the daycare kids
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: We have been using elderberry for a long time. I have always purchased the sambucus syrup, but for ease of traveling, purchased the gummies. They arrived and were ROCK hard. My kids could barely bite into them. The taste was definitely no one near the yummy taste of the elderberry syrup. I wouldn’t purchase these again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Harb

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and convenient but lose dose and not my favorite brand
customer_reviews.text: These gummies are so delicious. And you can't beat the convenience over a bottle of elderberry syrup that needs refrigeration. But these are highly priced relative to the grams (milligrams) per serving compared to other brands/forms of elderberry. Also, to get a more maximal dose of 4-5 g (as opposed to 50 mg), the calories and price would be prohibitive. I enjoyed my one order very much, but I won't be reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sorry I really really wanted to like this product. The texture is gelatinous that makes you want to gag when you’re chewing it. I also was surprised that it was tasteless. I hope they improve the texture and the flavor but for now I cannot get this product a two thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Telsa

customer_reviews.title: The gummies are sprayed?
customer_reviews.text: I love the sambucus brand, especially the syrup but i was told recently that all gummy vitamins and the like are just sprayed and theres not real proof that it gets absorbed. For how much these cost i hope thats not the case because i’ve been under the impression they were just as good as the syrup.... considering doing just the syrup now. These honestly taste delicious I’m really sad if they do not have the immunity boost or the quality the syrup offers. Would love someone from the company to contact me about this.
customer_reviews.author: Jason & Stefanie

customer_reviews.title: Good taste
customer_reviews.text: Does it really work against cold and flu? I think most of it is psychological hype. Flu will hit one person hard and barely phase the next person whether you take anything or not. Plus you can be sick one day and fine the next without taking something, so who really knows. It’s good for you either way. The gummies taste great to me and my 2 year old. My older two don’t normally like gummies so they didn’t like this one either, but they are picky eaters.
customer_reviews.author: amm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for my 3 years old day care boy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product one daily basis to my 2,5 years old boy last 6 month. He is also very picky eater and used to be sick frequently at school, so far the product is working great! He got sick less than all other his friends and us. My only concern to producer!? Is it a toxic level till that we should avoid to give for 3 years old daily basis? Should I give some period only or stick on it daily basis? Like other vitamins. Otherwise works great!
customer_reviews.author: MOMMY IN HAWAII

customer_reviews.title: Definitely helps boost immune system
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both have weakened immune systems, hers due to her heart and mine due to lupus. We have taken these elderberry berry gummies for years during cold and flu season and I believe these are what has kept us safe. I make sure we always have these on hand all year. They aren't real soft, but easy to chew, and taste like grape to us.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie K

customer_reviews.title: Buy this product! It works!
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic! I'm telling you since I bought the my kids haven't got sick. The whole family loves the flavor. This is the one vitamin that my kids don't complain about! And I have bought some that had a weird sugar substance covering them that were not so good, these ones are so much better! I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: ACJARAMILLO

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh.. didn’t help us!
customer_reviews.text: Well, my kids take these every day, and they’ve both gotten the flu for the last two years at least once per flu season so... don’t put all your faith in elderberry. I suppose it won’t do any harm though but it gets expensive and I’m not so sure it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: L&S

customer_reviews.title: Immune and Energy System Boost
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a boost during this virus fiasco. Immune system was a bit down so been chewing on these gummies. So far, all good. No side effects but knowing I'm giving it a go with a positive attitude. Energy for house cleaning has gone up!
customer_reviews.author: Rescue 51

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good, might work?
customer_reviews.text: This is another natural remedy that I researched online when I got sick in September 2017. The taste is very pleasant in my opinion. Not sure if these helped me, but I will take them again in the future if I get sick. I used these in combination with Zicam melts, and I did seem to not have severe cold symptoms as long as I had in the past, when I didn't take these supplements. So take my review with a grain of salt, as I can't scientifically say these helped, but if you are lime me, and get sick a lot, you will try anything to try and get better as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to chew and great taste
customer_reviews.text: These are gummies that have a great tatse! I like sour so I was OK with the slighly tart taste that they have. My kids did do not care for sour but were fine taking them. They are easy to chew and have a gummy texture. They are not sticky!
customer_reviews.author: TeacherMom

customer_reviews.title: Citric acid binds with zinc?
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased these gummies and see that citric acid is listed in ingredients. A package of zinc lozenges that I have (not this brand) says to not eat citrus fruit or citric acid within an hour of taking the zinc; that citric acid diminishes absorption/effectiveness of zinc. So I don't know if the zinc in these gummies is going to be effective? I'm waiting to hear back from the company.
customer_reviews.author: Beebalm

customer_reviews.title: Super tart
customer_reviews.text: This was the first brand of elderberry gummies I tried and they are super tart. If you like sour or tart candy its wonderful but not everyone in my family liked it. It also had a lower concentration of elderberry extract than the next brand at this price point. We've been on this bottle for a week and a half and it appears to be keeping us reasonably healthy. If you like your supplements sour or tart, this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t take it you have pre-existing health issues.
customer_reviews.text: Caused my raynaud's to flare up making big toe numb and stomach is constantly turning. When I skipped a day I felt fine so it’s gotta be these. They must help others with cold and “immunity” but was a no go for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kailey Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Not properly SEALED PROTECTIVE SEAL
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy this product in couple or more to stock up. I was so disappointed after I opened one bottle and found it was not SEALED properly. As I opened the lid, half of the protective seal was opened. So it ended in the trash! Wasted money for that. The last bottle I opened was okay, protective seal was intact.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Elderberry has helped me for 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: I feel that my taking Elderberry, both the liquid kind and these gummies, has aided me in NOT getting bronchitis or cold, for 2 years!! WOW, a blessing. These gummies are easy to take and taste good, to me. If I feel like a cold may be starting, I take extra elderberry. I find I like these, rather than the liquid elderberry. Will continue to buy and get several more of these, so I do not run out!
customer_reviews.author: N. C.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and effective in shortening my cold.
customer_reviews.text: I started taking this during a bad cold complicated by my asthma. It worked great in alleviating my cold symptoms (stuffy nose, sneezing, and fatigue) while I used my regular medication for my asthma symptoms. I will continue to take it each day for preventative care, especially through this cold season.
customer_reviews.author: CPLee

customer_reviews.title: Delicious elderberry
customer_reviews.text: I love these gummy's. They taste delicious and easy to chew. My only recommendation is to buy more than you think you need because if you take 2 a day as directed, they go quickly.
customer_reviews.author: clairemeleon

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t been taking very long to say if it works but the taste is really good. I will say that I have chronic sinusitis and generally it turns into a cold or flu but knock on wood it hasn’t this year. I live in the Chicagoland area and we really haven’t had a bad winter this year. So I don’t know if it was the gummies fighting it off or the fact that we e not had the really bad weather yet.
customer_reviews.author: justice

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and a great price
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and no gelatin which is a big deal to me. Obviously the effectiveness is subjective and anecdotal but I can say using elderberry drops did seem to get me through a cold in record time. Since I’ve decided that elderberry is ‘right for me’ this is a really yummy and convenient way to take it. Also, $3 cheaper here than at the cheapest grocery store in my area so that’s also a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Coghan

product_meta.title: Nature's Way Sambucus Elderberry Gummies, Herbal Supplements with Vitamin C and Zinc, Gluten Free, Vegetarian, 60 Gummies (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description: For centuries the dark berries of European black elder (Sambucus nigra L.) have been traditionally used as a winter remedy for immune support.* Nature's Way Standardized Sambucus is the superior black elderberry extract. Premium ElderberriesMade with our unique, full-spectrum black elderberry extract that is from a unique blend of black elderberries that are naturally richer in Flavonoid BioActives. Superior Quality: Our elderberry extract has been tested for bioavailability and shown to be active within the body. Product is made with a gentle, solvent-free extraction method that ensures maximum flavonoid potency. Adults and children 4 years of age and older, chew 2 gummies daily.
feature_bullets: Triple action immune blend with vitamin C, zinc, and black elderberry extract.
Sambucus elderberry gummies are made from black elderberry extract. Elderberries have traditionally been used as a winter remedy for immune support.*
Full-spectrum black elderberry extract is standardized to anthocyanins, which are potent flavonoid BioActives.
Our elderberry extract has been tested for bioavailability and activity within the body.
Gluten-free. No wheat, soy, dairy, eggs, peanuts, or artificial colors.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
